title: A SQL injection vulnerability in Vanilla

profile.name: Vanilla
profile.about: Vanilla is a powerfully simple discussion forum you can easily customize to make as unique as your community.

activities.message: Hi there. Thank you for submitting this report. It has been assigned to a developer who will assess and provide his feedback.
This report has been triaged and a patch will be prepared soon. Thank you for reporting.
Shipped in 2.6.2, 2.5.5, upcoming 2.7, and previously to cloud.

summaries.content:
Because the value of conversationID is controlled by the attacker.The attacker can construct an array and perform SQL injection.
Credit: ADLab of Venustech
